get.summary: Get a single commercial Marketplace public product.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique product Id or product id

parameters.name: market
parameters.description:
Product market value  (the response will include only products that can be sold in the specified market)
Possible values can be found at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-geo-availability-currencies. Example: 'US'

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the REST API used for the request.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language to search, ISO 639-1 two-letter code, possible values - 'en,cs,de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,nl,pl,pt-br,pt-pt,ru,sv,tr,zh-hans,zh-hant'. Default is "en"

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: Return products available in selected location. Enumeration of the Azure datacenter regions. See https://azure.microsoft.com/regions/

parameters.name: includeStopSoldPlans
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include in the response the product's plans/SKUs that are no longer available for purchase. By default, includeStopSoldPlans is set to FALSE.

parameters.name: hideKeys
parameters.description: This key is utilized to retrieve preview products and is generated within the Partner Center during the offer publishing process.

parameters.name: excludeSkuDetails
parameters.description: By default SKU details are included (excludeSkuDetails = FALSE ), to exclude SKU details in the response, set excludeSkuDetails to TRUE.

parameters.name: includeFutureAvailabilities
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include the product's plans/SKU availabilities with future dates in the response. By default, includeFutureAvailabilities is set to FALSE.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: Apply SKU ID filtering to the results and only return products that include SKUs matching the selected SKU ID.

parameters.name: x-ms-pricing-audience
parameters.description: DirectCommercial or PartnerCommercial, DirectCommercial is the default

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Use Api key provided by Marketplace Catalog Team as a parameter provided in the header

200.description: Returns a single public or preview product

default.description:
Error Responses: 

 * 400 - In case of a misconfigured request.

 * 401 - In case of a missing api key header

 * 404 - In case product not found.

 * 500 - In case of internal error.

get.summary: Get a list of commercial public products.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the REST API used for the request.

parameters.name: storefront
parameters.description:
Return products available in Azure Portal Marketplace, AppSource or Azure Marketplace portal. The possible values are: 
- `azure` - Azure Portal Marketplace
- `amp` - Azure Marketplace portal
- `appsource` - AppSource portal
The default value is 'azure'

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language to search, ISO 639-1 two-letter code, possible values - 'en,cs,de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,nl,pl,pt-br,pt-pt,ru,sv,tr,zh-hans,zh-hant'. Default is "en"

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: Return products available in selected location. Enumeration of the Azure datacenter regions. See https://azure.microsoft.com/regions/

parameters.name: market
parameters.description:
Product market value  (the response will include only products that can be sold in the specified market)
Possible values can be found at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-geo-availability-currencies. Example: 'US'

parameters.name: hideKeys
parameters.description: This key is utilized to retrieve preview products and is generated within the Partner Center during the offer publishing process.

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Selects which properties to include in the results. Example: 'select=displayName'

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition. Example: 'filter=productType eq "VirtualMachine"'. Fields that can be filtered by are:
- `displayName`
- `productId`
- `popularity`
- `categoryIds`
- `industryIds`
- `publisherId`
- `uniqueProductId`
- `productType`
- `operatingSystems`
- `pricingTypes`
- `publisherDisplayName`
- `longSummary`
- `summary`
- `linkedAddinsTypes`
- `description`
- `supportedProducts`
- `applicableProducts`
- `lastModifiedDateTime`
- `plan.planId`
- `plan.displayName`
- `plan.cspState`
- `plan.altStackReference`
- `plan.stackType`
- `plan.categoryIds`
- `plan.hasProtectedArtifacts`
- `plan.pricingTypes`
- `plan.summary`
- `plan.description`
- `plan.skuId`
- `plan.displayRank`
- `plan.isPrivate`

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Expands related entities inline. Example: 'expand=startingPrice'

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description:
Ordering expression for the results using OData notation. Avoid using orderby unless essential as this may impact the latency of your request.  Example: 'orderby=displayName desc'.This API only supports ordering by a single field. Fields that can be ordered by are:
- `lastModifiedDateTime`
- `uniqueProductId`
- `productType`
- `displayName`
- `publisherId`

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Use Api key provided by Marketplace Catalog Team as a parameter provided in the header

200.description: Returns a list of public or preview products

default.description:
Error Responses: 

 * 400 - In case of a misconfigured request.

 * 401 - In case of a missing api key header

 * 500 - In case of internal error.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the REST API used for the request.

parameters.name: serviceFamily
parameters.description: The service family of the product, such as 'Compute'

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The service name of the product, such as 'Virtual Machines'

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language to search, ISO 639-1 two-letter code, possible values - 'en,cs,de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,nl,pl,pt-br,pt-pt,ru,sv,tr,zh-hans,zh-hant'. Default is "en"

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: Return skus available in selected location. Enumeration of the Azure datacenter regions. See https://azure.microsoft.com/regions/

parameters.name: market
parameters.description:
Product market value  (the response will include only skus that can be sold in the specified market)
Possible values can be found at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-geo-availability-currencies. Example: 'US'

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Selects which properties to include in the results. Example: 'select=skuTitle'

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition. Example: 'filter=productType eq "VirtualMachine"'. Fields that can be filtered by are:
- `productId`
- `productDisplayName`
- `productDescription`
- `publisherId`
- `publisherType`
- `productType`
- `productSubType`
- `productAttributes`
- `skuName`
- `skuId`
- `skuType`
- `skuDescription`
- `skuTitle`
- `armRegionName`
- `skuGroupId`
- `cloud`
- `locationType`
- `region`
- `lastModifiedDateTime`
- `zone`
- `serviceType`
- `skuAttributes`
- `skuProperties`
- `offeringProperties`

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description:
Ordering expression for the results using OData notation. Avoid using orderby unless essential as this may impact the latency of your request.  Example: 'orderby=skuName desc'.This API only supports ordering by a single field. Fields that can be ordered by are:
- `lastModifiedDateTime`
- `publisherId`
- `productType`
- `skuName`
- `skuType`

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Use Api key provided by Marketplace Catalog Team as a parameter provided in the header

200.description: Returns a list of public or preview products

default.description:
Error Responses: 

 * 400 - In case of a misconfigured request.

 * 401 - In case of a missing api key header

 * 500 - In case of internal error.

ErrorResponseDetails.description: The API error response details object

code.description: The error code description. Such as code=InternalError

message.description: The error message. Such as message=Internal server error

categoryIds.description: Array of product categories, https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-categories-industries#categories. Such as 'Productivity'

industryIds.description: List of industry IDs the item belongs to

azureBenefit.description:
Eligibility for Azure consumption commitment benefit (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/azure-consumption-commitment-benefit). Possible values: 
- `Eligible` - Product is eligible for Azure consumption commitment benefit
- `NotEligible` - Product is not eligible for Azure consumption commitment benefit

badges.description: The following product badges are available: preferredSolution, powerBICertified, AdditionalPurchaseRequirement

publisherType.description:
A value indicating whether this is a Microsoft or third party product. Possible values:
- `Microsoft` - Product is published by Microsoft (1st party product)
- `Third Party` - Product is published by Third Party Vendor

publishingStage.description:
Product publishing stage. Possible values:
- `Preview` - Product is available to restricted audience
- `Public` - Product is publicly available in the Marketplace

productType.description:
The delivery method or deployment model. Possible values:
- `SaaS` - The product is a Software solution purchased on pay-as-you-go basis from a cloud service provider
- `VirtualMachine` -  The product is Image service instances with usage-based pricing
- `AzureApplication` - Products published as Solution Templates (ST) or Azure Managed Apps (AMA) plans that deploy Azure resources to the customer tenant 
- `DynamicsCE` - All Dynamics products except for DynamicsBC and DynamicsOps
- `DynamicsBC` - Dynamics 365 business Central 
- `Container` -  The product is delivered as Container
- `DynamicsOps` - Dynamics 365 Operations Apps
- `None` - Product type returned for Azure Services, Container Extensions and VM extensions
- `IotEdgeModules` - Resource is delivered as IoT Edge Module
- `ContainerApps` - Resource is delivered as Container App
- `ConsultingServices` Consulting Services (available only in Azure Marketplace as listing offers)
- `ManagedServices` - The product is delivered as Managed Service
- `PowerBI` - Power BI products
- `CosellOnly` - Products available in scope of Co-Sell program only
- `PowerBIVisuals` - Power BI Visuals products
- `Office365` - Office 365 products
- `DevService` - Dev Service
- `AADApps` - Azure Active Directory Applications
- `VisualStudioExtension` - Visual Studio Extensions
- `SolutionTemplate` - Solution Template plan type (applicable to Azure Applications only)
- `ManagedApplication` - Managed Application plan type (applicable to Azure Applications only)
- `MicrosoftProduct` - 1st party Azure product

operatingSystems.description: Operating system info for this product

pricingTypes.description:
The list of the pricing types for which this offer is designated. Possible Values: 
- `Free` - Product has at least one plan that is free of charge.
- `FreeTrial` - Product has at least one plan that is free trial.
- `Byol` - Product has at least one plan that is bring your own license.
- `Payg` - Product has at least one plan that is Pay as you go, usage based billing model.
- `Ri` - Product has at least one plan that is Reserved Instance billing model.

smallIconUri.description: URI to the small product icon

ratingBuckets.description: Rating buckets, Above1, Above2, Above3, Above4

ratingCount.description: Total number of ratings for the offer

startingPrice.description: Retail price of the product's cheapest plan

supportedProducts.description: Maps to the list of compatible products that the publisher provides

applicableProducts.description: Product categories the offer belongs to

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Latest update date of the product

locations.description: List of locations which are available on the SKUs

serviceFamily.description: The service family of the product, such as 'Compute'

service.description: The service name of the product, such as 'Virtual Machines'

productId.description: The unique id of the product

hasMarketplaceFootprint.description: Indication if product has a representation in the marketplace

attributes.description: Set of products attributes (varies per product type), where each attribute is represented by a pair of key (attribute name) and value(attribute value)

hasStandardContractAmendments.description: A value indicating whether standard contract amendments are present for this product

standardContractAmendmentsRevisionId.description: Standard contract amendments for the product

universalAmendmentUrl.description: The universal amendment link for an enterprise contract.

isPrivate.description: A value indicating whether the item is private

isStopSell.description: A value indicating whether sale of this item is stopped

stopSellInfo.description: A StopSellInfo object providing stop sell related data

marketingMaterial.description: Includes links to the learning and marketing materials as configured by the publisher

legalTermsType.description:
Supported legal terms type. Possible values:
- `EA` - Microsoft Enterprise Agreement
- `None` - None

privacyPolicyUri.description: Uri to the privacy policy of the product

screenshotUris.description: List of screenshot image URIs provided for the item

links.description: List of Links provided for the item

linkedAddIns.description: List of linked Add Ins provided for the item

mediumIconUri.description: URI to the medium product icon

largeIconUri.description: URI to the large product icon

wideIconUri.description: URI to the wide product icon

additionalProductProperties.description: Dictionary of additional properties provided for the item

pricingDetailsUri.description: Pricing details uri of the product

isReseller.description: A value indicating whether microsoft is acting as a reseller

disableSendEmailOnPurchase.description: Indication to disable sending email on purchase

isCoreVm.description: Set to true only for offers of ProductType.VirtualMachine to indicate that it was originally of ProductType.CoreVirtualMachine

AzureBenefit.description:
Eligibility for Azure consumption commitment benefit (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/azure-consumption-commitment-benefit). Possible values: 
- `Eligible` - The product is eligible for Azure consumption commitment benefit
- `NotEligible` - The product is not eligible for Azure consumption commitment benefit

PublisherType.description:
A value indicating whether this is a Microsoft or third party product. Possible values:
- `Microsoft` - Product is published by Microsoft (1st party product)
- `Third Party` - Product is published by Third Party Vendor

PublishingStage.description:
Product publishing stage. Possible values:
- `Preview` - Product is available to restricted audience
- `Public` - Product is publicly available in the Marketplace

ProductType.description:
The delivery method or deployment model. Possible values:
- `SaaS` - The product is a Software solution purchased on pay-as-you-go basis from a cloud service provider
- `VirtualMachine` -  The product is Image service instances with usage-based pricing
- `AzureApplication` - Products published as Solution Templates (ST) or Azure Managed Apps (AMA) plans that deploy Azure resources to the customer tenant 
- `DynamicsCE` - All Dynamics products except for DynamicsBC and DynamicsOps
- `DynamicsBC` - Dynamics 365 business Central 
- `Container` -  The product is delivered as Container
- `DynamicsOps` - Dynamics 365 Operations Apps
- `None` - Product type returned for Azure Services, Container Extensions and VM extensions
- `IotEdgeModules` - Resource is delivered as IoT Edge Module
- `ContainerApps` - Resource is delivered as Container App
- `ConsultingServices` Consulting Services (available only in Azure Marketplace as listing offers)
- `ManagedServices` - The product is delivered as Managed Service
- `PowerBI` - Power BI products
- `CosellOnly` - Products available in scope of Co-Sell program only
- `PowerBIVisuals` - Power BI Visuals products
- `Office365` - Office 365 products
- `DevService` - Dev Service
- `AADApps` - Azure Active Directory Applications
- `VisualStudioExtension` - Visual Studio Extensions
- `SolutionTemplate` - Solution Template plan type (applicable to Azure Applications only)
- `ManagedApplication` - Managed Application plan type (applicable to Azure Applications only)
- `MicrosoftProduct` - 1st party Azure product

Attribute.description: Represents a SKU attribute, which consists of a key and value. The attributes may differ across various services.

MarketStartPrice.description: Retail price of the product's cheapest plan

market.description: The market for which the starting price is calculated

PlanSummary.description: Returns a subset of Plan attributes

uniquePlanId.description: Unique plan Id which is prefixed by combining uniqueProductId and PlanId with no separator in between

displayName.description: Display name of the plan / sku

vmArchitectureType.description:
VM Architecture Type. Applicable to Virtual Machine products only.
Possible values:
- `Arm64` - The VM image architecture of the plan is Arm64
- `X64Gen1` - The VM image architecture of the plan is X64 Generation1
- `X64Gen2` - The VM image architecture of the plan is X64 Generation2

cspState.description:
Value showing whether the plan is available for purchase through CSP channel. Possible values: 
- `OptIn` - Plan configured CSP program opt-in for any partner in the CSP Program
- `Optout` - Plan configured CSP program opt-out
- `SelectiveOptIn` - Plan configured CSP program opt-in for specific partners in the CSP program ISV selects

hasProtectedArtifacts.description: Set to true if plan has artifacts that are to be hidden for non authenticated users

pricingTypes.description: The list of the pricing types for which this plan is designated (Possible values are the same as at product level)

vmSecuritytypes.description:
VM security type. Applicable to Virtual Machine products only. Possible values:
- Standard - Basic level of security for the virtual machine
- Trusted - protects against persistent and advanced attacks on Gen2 virtual machines with configurable features like security boot and virtual Trusted Platform Module(vTPM)
- Confidential - on top of Trusted Launch, Confidential virtual machines offer higher confidentiality and integrity guaranteed with hardware-based trusted execution environment

planType.description:
Managed Application or Solution template plan type (applicable only to Azure Applications product). Possible values: 
- `SolutionTemplate` - Solution Template plan type (applicable to Azure Applications only)
- `ManagedApplication` - Managed Application plan type (applicable to Azure Applications only)

displayRank.description: The order the plan is displayed in the 'Plans' table (as configured by the publisher)

isPrivate.description: Indication that the plan is accessible to restricted audience only

hasRI.description: Indication whether the SKU supports reservations

VmArchitectureType.description:
VM Architecture Type. Applicable to Virtual Machine products only.
Possible values:
- `Arm64` - The VM image architecture of the plan is Arm64
- `X64Gen1` - The VM image architecture of the plan is X64 Generation1
- `X64Gen2` - The VM image architecture of the plan is X64 Generation2

CspState.description:
Value showing whether the plan is available for purchase through CSP channel. Possible values: 
- `OptIn` - Plan configured CSP program opt-in for any partner in the CSP Program
- `Optout` - Plan configured CSP program opt-out
- `SelectiveOptIn` - Plan configured CSP program opt-in for specific partners in the CSP program ISV selects.
For more information see, https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/cloud-solution-providers

generation.description: The VM image generation (applicable to Virtual Machine products only).see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/generation-2

altStackReference.description: Pointing to a planId which holds the alternative stack reference

relatedSkus.description: Pointing to a planId of plans that are related to this plan

PlanSkuRelation.description: Pointing to a related SKU object

VmSecurityType.description:
VM security type. Applicable to Virtual Machine products only. Possible values:
- Standard - Basic level of security for the virtual machine
- Trusted - protects against persistent and advanced attacks on Gen2 virtual machines with configurable features like security boot and virtual Trusted Platform Module(vTPM)
- Confidential - on top of Trusted Launch, Confidential virtual machines offer higher confidentiality and integrity guaranteed with hardware-based trusted execution environment

StopSellInfo.description: Represents a model for stop sell related information

startDate.description: A value indicating when the sale of this item is going to be stopped

reason.description: A value indicating the reason for stopping to sell this item. Possible values are: EndOfSupport, SecurityIssue, Other

alternativeOfferId.description: A value indicating an ID of an alternative offer provided by the same publisher

alternativePlanId.description: A value indicating an ID of an alternative plan of the same offer

StopSellReason.description: Reason for stopping to sell an item

MarketingMaterial.description: Includes links to the learning and marketing materials as configured by the publisher

LegalTermsType.description:
Supported legal terms type. Possible values:
- `EA` - Microsoft Enterprise Agreement
- `None` - None

LinkProperties.description: Represents a link item read from the gallery item package

Image.description: Includes link to the product image (can be displayed on product details page).

Artifact.description: Plan level resources and configuration files

artifactType.description:
The type of the artifact. Possible values:
- `Custom` - Custom artifact type
- `Fragment` - Contains link to the nested ARM template
- `Metadata` - Metadata artifact type
- `Template` - Contains link to the main ARM template

ArtifactType.description:
The type of the artifact. Possible values:
- `Custom` - Custom artifact type
- `Fragment` - Contains link to the nested ARM template
- `Metadata` - Metadata artifact type
- `Template` - Contains link to the main ARM template

uniquePlanId.description: Unique plan Id which is prefixed by combining uniqueProductId and PlanId with no separator in between

displayName.description: Display name of the plan / sku

vmArchitectureType.description:
VM Architecture Type. Applicable to Virtual Machine products only.
Possible values:
- `Arm64` - The VM image architecture of the plan is Arm64
- `X64Gen1` - The VM image architecture of the plan is X64 Generation1
- `X64Gen2` - The VM image architecture of the plan is X64 Generation2

cspState.description:
Value showing whether the plan is available for purchase through CSP channel. Possible values: 
- `OptIn` - Plan configured CSP program opt-in for any partner in the CSP Program
- `Optout` - Plan configured CSP program opt-out
- `SelectiveOptIn` - Plan configured CSP program opt-in for specific partners in the CSP program ISV selects

hasProtectedArtifacts.description: Set to true if plan has artifacts that are to be hidden for non authenticated users

pricingTypes.description: The list of the pricing types for which this plan is designated (Possible values are the same as at product level)

vmSecuritytypes.description:
VM security type. Applicable to Virtual Machine products only. Possible values:
- Standard - Basic level of security for the virtual machine
- Trusted - protects against persistent and advanced attacks on Gen2 virtual machines with configurable features like security boot and virtual Trusted Platform Module(vTPM)
- Confidential - on top of Trusted Launch, Confidential virtual machines offer higher confidentiality and integrity guaranteed with hardware-based trusted execution environment

planType.description:
Managed Application or Solution template plan type (applicable only to Azure Applications product). Possible values: 
- `SolutionTemplate` - Solution Template plan type (applicable to Azure Applications only)
- `ManagedApplication` - Managed Application plan type (applicable to Azure Applications only)

displayRank.description: The order the plan is displayed in the 'Plans' table (as configured by the publisher)

isPrivate.description: Indication that the plan is accessible to restricted audience only

availabilities.description: List of availabilities for this plan

uiDefinitionUri.description: What blade to open when someone wants to create a marketplace item

artifacts.description: Files related to the marketplace item

isHidden.description: A value indicating whether the plan is hidden

isStopSell.description: A value indicating whether plan has been stopped from selling

stopSellInfo.description: A StopSellInfo object providing stop sell related data

isQuantifiable.description: A value indicating whether the plan is quantifiable

isHiddenPrivateOffer.description: A value indicating whether the plan is used as hidden private offer requiring a quote

skuAttributes.description: Set of SKU attributes (varies per sku type), where each attribute is represented by a pair of key (attribute name) and value(attribute value)

SkuProperties.description: The SKU properties, contains some of the attributes for faster OData filter

dataDiskType.description: The data disk type, such as 'Ssd'

pricingAudience.description:
Supported pricing audiences. Possible values:
- `DirectCommercial` -  Available to commercial direct channel
- `PartnerCommercial` - Available to Cloud Solution Providers (CSP)

hasFreeTrials.description: A value indicating whether it has free trials

isPIRequired.description: A value indicating whether a payment instrument is required

msrp.description: Manufacturer's suggested retail price for the item

PurchaseDurationDiscount.description: The percentage discount for 3rd party virtual machines software reservations

CatalogApiResponse.description:
Response page composed of a list of Product objects(that includes subset of product attributes) together with a next page link.
Usually product attributes returned in the list are used to build product tiles for Marketplace Gallery.
Note:note The max number of items returned per page is 100. In specific cases for performance optimization, please contact Microsoft Marketplace team MKPL_Platform_API_DL@microsoft.com

nextPageLink.description: Link to the next page where request returns more than a single page of results

SkuApiResponse.description: Response page composed of a list of SKU Summaries together with a next page link

nextPageLink.description: Link to the next page where request returns more than a single page of results

- `FreeTrial` - Product has at least one plan that is free trial.
- `Byol` - Product has at least one plan that is bring your own license.
- `Payg` - Product has at least one plan that is Pay as you go, usage based billing model.
- `Ri` - Product has at least one plan that is Reserved Instance billing model.

smallIconUri.description: URI to the small product icon

cspLegalTermsUri.description: The legal terms of the product for the CSP

privacyPolicyUri.description: The privacy policy of the product

ratingBuckets.description: Rating buckets, Above1, Above2, Above3, Above4

ratingCount.description: Total number of ratings for the offer

startingPrice.description: Retail price of the product's cheapest plan

plans.description: List of plans that are available for this product

supportedProducts.description: Maps to the list of compatible products that the publisher provides

applicableProducts.description: Product categories the offer belongs to

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Latest update date of the product

locations.description: List of locations which are available on the SKUs

serviceFamily.description: The service family of the product, such as 'Compute'

service.description: The service name of the product, such as 'Virtual Machines'

productId.description: The unique id of the product

hasRIPlans.description: Indication whether the product has plans with reservations

hasMarketplaceFootprint.description: Indication if product has a representation in the marketplace

attributes.description: Set of products attributes (varies per product type), where each attribute is represented by a pair of key (attribute name) and value(attribute value)
